General.Name: Anhui Yingjia Distillery Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Yingjia Distillery Co., Ltd. operates in the brewing industry in China. The company offers various wine products. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Luan, China. Anhui Yingjia Distillery Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Anhui Yingjia Group Co., Ltd..

8.Name: Ms. Ling  Gao
8.Title: Director of Wine Design Center and Member of The Supervisory Board
